lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Hugh's diet not work?
lyrics.translation: 为什么休的节食计划没有奏效？

lyrics.text: My friend Hugh has always been fat, but things got so bad recently that he decided to go
lyrics.translation: 我的朋友休一直都很胖，但最近情况变得如此糟糕，以至于他决定去

lyrics.text: He began his diet a week ago.
lyrics.translation: 他一周前开始了他的饮食。

lyrics.text: First of all, he wrote out a long list of all the foods which were forbidden.
lyrics.translation: 首先，他列出了所有被禁止的食物的长清单。

lyrics.text: The list included most of the things Hugh loves.
lyrics.translation: 这个清单包括了休喜欢的大部分东西。

lyrics.text: Butter, potatoes, rice, beer, milk, chocolate, and sweets.
lyrics.translation: 黄油，土豆，大米，啤酒，牛奶，巧克力和糖果。

lyrics.text: Yesterday I paid him a visit.
I rang the bell and was not surprised to see that Hugh was still as fat as ever.
lyrics.translation: 我按了门铃，看到休还是和以前一样胖，我并不感到惊讶。

lyrics.text: He led me into his room and hurriedly hid a large parcel under his desk.
lyrics.translation: 他带我进了他的房间，急忙把一个大包裹藏在了他的桌子下面。

lyrics.text: It was obvious that he was very embarrassed.
When I asked him what he was doing, he smiled guiltily and then put the parcel on the desk.
lyrics.translation: 当我问他在做什么时，他内疚地笑了笑，然后把包裹放在了桌子上。

lyrics.text: He explained that his diet was so strict that he had to reward himself occasionally.
lyrics.translation: 他解释说，他的饮食控制得如此严格，以至于他不得不偶尔奖励自己一下。

lyrics.text: Then he showed me the contents of the parcel.
lyrics.translation: 然后他给我看了包裹里的内容。

lyrics.text: It contained five large bars of chocolate and three bags of sweets.
lyrics.translation: 它包含五块大巧克力和三袋糖果。
